content:
Yes, there are definitely some bars and clubs in Graz that stay open late. Here are some recommendations:

1. Postgarage - This multi-purpose event space hosts concerts, parties, and other events and often stays open until the early hours of the morning.

2. Club Q - This popular LGBT+ club is open until the early morning hours on weekends and features multiple dance floors, DJs, and live performances.

3. Kottulinsky - This stylish bar and club is open until 4am on weekends and features a variety of music, including electronic and house.

4. Die Thalia - This dance club is open until the early morning hours and features a variety of music, including techno and house.

5. Utopia Island - This electronic music club is open until late on weekends and features DJs and live performances.

I hope this helps and that you have a great time exploring the night scene in Graz!
